subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joe Thornton, Patrick Marleau and Dany Heatley, the No. 1-seeded San Jose Sharks’ top line, have accumulated 103 regular-season goals and 3 Olympic gold medals this season.
snippet: Joe Thornton, Patrick Marleau and Dany Heatley, the No. 1-seeded San Jose Sharks’ top line, have accumulated 103 regular-season goals and 3 Olympic gold medals this season.
